explains: n. 圆翻领；高翻领毛衣

sentences.en: Yes, you can do that in jeans and a black turtleneck.
sentences.cn: 也可以，那你就可以穿牛仔裤和高领毛衣。

sentences.en: Problem one: a T-shirt is a little less memorable than a turtleneck.
sentences.cn: 问题1：T恤是一个比高领更容易让人看过就忘的衣服。

sentences.en: You can have your turtleneck in any color you want, as long as it's black.
sentences.cn: 只要你的高领毛衣是黑色的，你可以把他换成任何颜色。
